screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .rbxl file in Roblox Studio
screenshot.caption: RBXL file open in Roblox Studio

description: In Roblox Studio, you can choose from a variety of models, meshes, decals, and audio to apply to vehicles, weapons, buildings, and NPCs that can be played in the Roblox game. All of this information is stored in the RBXL file.
You can create an RBXL file in Roblox Studio by selecting FILE → New . After you make edits to the file, you can save it by selecting FILE → Save or Save As... .

images.alt: Screenshot of a .rbxl file in Roblox Studio
images.caption: RBXL file open in Roblox Studio
